title: Introduction to Arrays
description: An array is a collection of variables of the same type, stored in contiguous memory locations.

title: Declaring and Initializing Arrays
description: Arrays can be declared and initialized using different approaches.

title: Traversing an Array using For Loop
description: You can loop through an array using a for loop.

title: Traversing an Array using For-Each Loop
description: You can also iterate through an array using a for-each loop.

title: Multidimensional Arrays
description: A multidimensional array is an array of arrays.
